mxCell.value:
Fraction(expression)

A constructor which creates fraction from string.
The given expression shall be represented by "whole&numerator/denominator"; for example,
"3&1/4", “-1&7/8”.

Improper fractions, whole numbers, and negative numbers are allowed as operands.

It may throw an exception in the case of any invalid argument or missing character.

produce_fractional_result(input)

This function takes user input, extracts the operands and the operator and validates them. Then returns the result string in the form of "whole&numerator/denominator".

It may throw an exception if there is an invalid operator.

extract_operands_op(input)

This function extracts the operands and the operator from the given input string and returns them.

It may throw an exception if there is any missing operand or operator.
throw exception: '&' is given but there is no '/'

denominator = 1
/* technically it will help later to calculate with fractions if we choose 1 as denominator*/

throw exception:
negative sign can be only on the left side of the operand

m_numerator = abs(numerator) + abs(whole) * abs(denominator);
m_denominator = denominator;
m_numerator *= (whole < 0 || numerator < 0) ? -1 : 1;
Don't store the whole part of the expression because it's much easier to calculate with pure fractions.
